prompt_base: photograph of a beautiful mature asian woman, traditional chinese blue qipao dress, long straight black hair in an elaborate bun, wide jawline, soft realistic skin texture, maternal yet fierce expression, pink silk scarf
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k uhd, dslr, soft natural lighting, high quality, film grain, subtle subsurface scattering on skin, detailed straight hair strands, fabric texture on dress
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, drawing, CGI, doll, plastic, smooth black hair, harsh shadows, exaggerated features, low quality, overly saturated blue
